name: Welcome To The Club
description:
Hi , Welcome To The Club!

We are excited to present  to you our very first VR game.

This is a  VR minigame with loveable furry character and a wide range of content to unlock such as new game modes/experiences. Put your skills and accuracy to the test by engaging in these games and finish every mode by reaching a score limit to unlock rewards.

Mini Games:

Nodes Ninja: smash the musical nodes using  your bare fists or the special blade that is provided to you . 

Hoops: throw the colour balls into   the same colour hoops to get points.

Hit the Bottles: break glass bottles with balls ;). 

??? (finish all three to  unlock)

Finish each minigame under a certain time limit and get enough scores then you will gain respect from the bartender who will grant access to more games and experiences.

Controller Instructions:   please see the instruction sheet in the zip file. 

And welcome to leave comments for play-testing feedback or suggestions.

PolyGalleon Studios  All rights reserved

Ryan Valdes - Game Designer,  Chief Artist, Music Composer, Copywriter, Project Manager

Eric Wang  -  bananabiz.itch.io

Sanjay Nadimpally - Chief Unreal Engine Programmer
